an5.68:1.1: “Pubbevāhaṃ, bhikkhave, sambodhā anabhisambuddho bodhisattova samāno pañca dhamme bhāvesiṃ, pañca dhamme bahulīkāsiṃ.
an5.68:1.3: Chandasamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgataṃ iddhipādaṃ bhāvesiṃ, vīriyasamādhi … cittasamādhi … vīmaṃsāsamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgataṃ iddhipādaṃ bhāvesiṃ, ussoḷhiññeva pañcamiṃ.
an5.68:1.4: So kho ahaṃ, bhikkhave, imesaṃ ussoḷhipañcamānaṃ dhammānaṃ bhāvitattā bahulīkatattā yassa yassa abhiññāsacchikaraṇīyassa dhammassa cittaṃ abhininnāmesiṃ abhiññāsacchikiriyāya,
an5.68:1.5: tatra tatreva sakkhibhabbataṃ pāpuṇiṃ sati sati āyatane.
an5.68:2.1: So sace ākaṅkhiṃ: ‘anekavihitaṃ iddhividhaṃ paccanubhaveyyaṃ …pe… yāva brahmalokāpi kāyena vasaṃ vatteyyan’ti,
an5.68:2.2: tatra tatreva sakkhibhabbataṃ pāpuṇiṃ sati sati āyatane.
an5.68:3.1: So sace ākaṅkhiṃ …pe… ‘āsavānaṃ khayā anāsavaṃ cetovimuttiṃ paññāvimuttiṃ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja vihareyyan’ti,
an5.68:3.2: tatra tatreva sakkhibhabbataṃ pāpuṇiṃ sati sati āyatane”ti.
